objects.description: [Stuxnet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0603) encodes the payload of system information sent to the command and control servers using a one byte 0xFF XOR key. [Stuxnet](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0603) also uses a 31-byte long static byte string to XOR data sent to command and control servers. The servers use a different static key to encrypt replies to the implant.(Citation: Symantec W.32 Stuxnet Dossier)

external_references.description: Nicolas Falliere, Liam O. Murchu, Eric Chien. (2011, February). W32.Stuxnet Dossier. Retrieved December 7, 2020.
